function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through close contact during data collection","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread among researchers and study participants","Mitigation":"Use of personal protective equipment, maintain safe distance, and minimize physical contact during data collection","Technologies":"Data collection tools with remote sensors and wireless data transmission capabilities","People":"Researchers, study participants","Owner":"Research institutions, study organizers"},{"Description":"High volume of articles and data collection may increase exposure risk to researchers","Impact":"Increased risk of prolonged exposure to potential sources of infection, leading to higher likelihood of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene measures, limit research team exposure, and use remote data collection methods where possible","Technologies":"Remote data collection tools, virtual data processing platforms","People":"Researchers, research team","Owner":"Research institutions, study organizers"},{"Description":"Disagreements between reviewers may result in delays and errors in data interpretation","Impact":"Inaccurate data interpretation and potential dissemination of incorrect information","Mitigation":"Establish clear review criteria, provide training on data charting process, and have a standardized protocol for resolving disagreements","Technologies":"Data validation and quality assurance tools, automated data comparison algorithms","People":"Reviewers, research team","Owner":"Research institutions, study organizers"}]}
